statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{11.72}; top has length \displaystyle{10.67}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{8.67} and \displaystyle{8.40}. The height is \displaystyle{8.23}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{10.67}+{8.40}+{11.72}+{8.67}={39.46}.
